description: Variation of conditions 2 (approved plans), 5 (surface water drainage), 6 (land contamination), 8 (sustainable homes), 9 (energy statement), 11 (open space), 12 (landscape management plan) ,13 (electric vehicle charging), 14 (cycle storage), 15 (waste storage) and 18 (boundary treatment) to allow phasing of the development approved under planning permission 00461/A/P1 approved 01/08/2016 (amended description)
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (15.10341.201 (PLANNING LAYOUT); 15.1034.L.202 (REFUSE AREA- BIN STORE DETAILS); 15.1034.L.203 (STREETSCENE 1of5); 15.1034.L.204 (STREETSCENE 2of5); 15.1034.L.205 (STREETSCENE 3of5); 15.1034.L.206 (STREETSCENE 4of5); 15.1034,L.207 (STREETSCENE 5of5); 15.1034.L.210 (BLOCK A&C PLANS); 15.1034.L.211 (BLOCKA&C ELEVATIONS); 15.1034.L,220 (BLOCKS PLANS); 15.1034.L.221 (BLOCKB ELEVATIONS); 15.1034.L.240 (BLOCK D (PLANS AND ELEVATIONS); 15.1034.L.250 (BLOCK E PLANS); 15.1034.L.251 (BLOCK E ELEVATIONS); 15.1034.L.260 (BLOCK F PLANS AND ELEVATIONS); 15.1034.L.270 (2B4P HOUSE TYPE); 15.1034.L.271 (3B5P HOUSE TYPE); 15.1034.L.272 (4B7P HOUSE TYPE) A1844-1500 PI; A1844-SK1505 PI; email (and attachments) from Zeke Osho dated 20th January 2015; AL4554_2500 (Existing Plan); AL4554_2501 Rev A (Landscape Plan); AL4554/ 2502 rev - (Landscape Plan - Detailed Areas); AL4554_2503 (Landscape Sections); AA3913/1-1/001 (Site Location Plan); AA3913/1-1/003 (Demolition Plan); AA3913/1-1/008 (Tree Retention / Removal). Flood Risk Assessment dated October 2014; Transport Assessment Rev A dated September 2014; Air Quality Assessment Rev A dated September 2014; Noise Assessment Rev A dated September 2014; Arboriculture and Tree. Assessment dated September 2014; Phase 1 Habitat Study dates September 2014; Energy and Code for Sustainable Homes Assessment dated September 2014. All approved under reference 00461/A/P1.
BOUYGUES UK Construction Issue and FOUNTAINS CLOSE - PHASING DIAGRAM S73 application received on 09/02/2018.
SCHEDULE 8 - PART 1 Nomination Rights received on 24/05/2018.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved materials; 2 x Brick samples; Wienerberger Maplehurst Light Multi Stock (red) and Wienerberger Sheerwater Silver Yellow Stock (buff) received on 11/08/2016. Cover letter ref 15.1034.L\PLANNING CONDITION 3\DE from ESP Design Ltd dated 09 August 2016 received on 11/08/2016 approved under 00461/A/P1(3,6,15), Cover letter ref 15.1034.L\PLANNING CONDITION 3\DE from ESP Design Ltd dated 09 August 2016 received on 22/12/2016. Fa?ade sample HardiePlank Smooth Cement Fibre Boarding in Grey, RAL 7015 received on 22/12/2016 approved under 00461/A/P1(3i) and CREST PLANUM ROOFING TILES specification sheet and Sample of Concrete roof tile; Crest Roofing Tile, The Planum in Anthracite Grey received on 15/09/2017 and Letter from esp design ref. 15.1034.L\PLANNING DE\REV B (AMENDMENTS IN RED) dated 18th September 2017 insofar as it does not relate to Staffordshire smooth blue engineering brick received on 02/10/2017 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(3ii).

Condition : 3 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved detailed recessed features, balconies (including any privacy screening), window frames and depth of window reveals; T01-6 rev 2015-01-05 and T02-6 rev 2015-01-05 received on 25/08/2016 and 15.1034.L.281 and 15.1034.L.280 rev A received on 13/12/2016, approved under reference 00461/A/P1(4,10,17,18).

Condition : 4 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved detailed surface water drainage scheme for the site; FCH-PBA-A22-EXT-SCH-SL-000006 received 25/10/2016 and FCH-PBA-A22-EXT-GA-SL-000005 A, Exploratory Hole Location Plan Figure 4, Factual Data Report AAA/98A dated January 2016 produced by Oakley Soils and Concrete Engineering Ltd, 38307_SW NETWORK.MDX dated 19.10.2016, BRE soakage test summary sheet AAA/98A, SDS Geolight Maintenance produced by Sustainable Drainage Systems Limited, ACO Water Management - Channel Drainage produced by ACO, Geo-Environmental Site Investigation ref 1547/Rpt 1v1 dated February 2016 and Groundwater Monitoring Record ref BBB/20 dated 24.03.2016. All received 20/10/2016, approved under reference 00461/A/P1(5).

Condition : 5 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the Geo-Environmental Site investigation Report ref 1547/Rpt 1v1 produced by Brown 2 Green Associates Ltd dated February 2016 and received on 11/08/2016 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(3,6,15).
During the course of the development:
i. The Local Planning Authority shall be notified immediately if additional contamination is discovered during the course of the development. A competent person shall assess the additional contamination, and shall submit appropriate amendments to the scheme for decontamination in writing to the Local Planning Authority for approval before any work on that aspect of development continues.
Before any part of phase 1 of the development is first brought into use:
ii. The agreed scheme for decontamination referred to above, including amendments, shall be fully implemented insofar as it relates to phase 1 of the development and a written validation (closure) report submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval.
Before any part of phase 2 of the development is first brought into use:
iii. The agreed scheme for decontamination referred to above, including amendments, shall be fully implemented and a written validation (closure) report submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval.

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 1995 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order) no enlargement of the houses or any additional structures/buildings within the curtilage of the houses hereby permitted site shall be carried out.

Condition : 7 - a)	Within 3 months of first occupation of any part of the development hereby approved, details and or Certification to demonstrate that each unit within phase 1 of the development accords with the equivalent of the Code for Sustainable Homes Level 4 shall have been submitted for approval by the Local Planning Authority.
b)	Within 3 months of first occupation of any part of phase 2 of the development hereby approved, details and or Certification to demonstrate that each unit in phase 2 of the development accords with the equivalent of the Code for Sustainable Homes Level 4 shall have been submitted for approval by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 8 - The development shall be completed in accordance with the details set out in the approved Energy Statement (Energy and Code for Sustainable Homes Assessment dated September 2014, approved under reference 00461/A/P1) prior to the occupation of any part of the development hereby permitted.

Condition : 9 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved hard and soft landscape works; FCH-BEA-A35-EXT-GA-GND-0002-B received on 24/10/2016 and GA-GND-001000 rev E, GA-GND-001001 rev E and FCH-BEA-A35-EXT-GA-GND-000014 received on 21/12/2016 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(4,10,17,18). 
The approved details shown on approved plans FCH-BEA-A35-EXT-GA-GND-0002-B and GA-GND-001000 rev E, GA-GND-001001 rev E and FCH-BEA-A35-EXT-GA-GND-000014 which lie within the phase 1 development area, as shown on approved plan 'FOUNTAINS CLOSE - PHASING DIAGRAM S73 application', shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development, and thereafter retained and maintained as such at all times thereafter.
All hard and soft landscaping shown on approved plans FCH-BEA-A35-EXT-GA-GND-0002-B, GA-GND-001000 rev E, GA-GND-001001 rev E and FCH-BEA-A35-EXT-GA-GND-000014 shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of phase 2 of the development and thereafter retained and maintained as such.
The approved landscaping works shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details and so maintained at all times thereafter.

Condition : 10 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details for the open space; 16-026-06 rev B and 16-026-14 rev A received on 20/06/2017, 16-026-07 rev C and 16-026-05 rev C received on 11/07/2017 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(11,12).
The open space included within phase 1 of the development shall be completed and be available to the public prior to the occupation of any part of the development hereby approved and so maintained at all times thereafter.
The open space area included within phase 2 of the development shall be completed in accordance with the approved plans and be available to the public prior to the occupation of any part of phase 2 of the development hereby approved and so maintained at all times thereafter.

Condition : 11 - The development shall be maintained strictly in accordance with the approved landscape management plan (Park landscape Management Plan ref FCH-BEA-A35-EXT-MP-GND-000015-B dated Jan 2017 prepared by bea landscape design ltd received on 20/06/2017 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(11,12)) for the lifetime of the development.

Condition : 12 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved active and passive electric vehicle charging points; Plan ref 001060 Rev A (with hand written annotations dated 6/6/17), Wallpod: EV Ready specification produced by Rolec EV and Autocharge Pedestal specification produced by Rolec EV received on 15/06/17 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(13) and so maintained at all times thereafter.
The active and passive electric vehicle charging points shown on approved plan 001060 Rev A (with hand written annotations dated 6/6/17) which lie within the phase 1 development area, as shown on approved plan 'FOUNTAINS CLOSE - PHASING DIAGRAM S73 application', shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development and thereafter retained and maintained as such at all times thereafter.
All active and passive electric vehicle charging points shown on approved plan 001060 Rev A (with hand written annotations dated 6/6/17) shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of phase 2 of the development and thereafter retained and maintained as such.

Condition : 13 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved cycling storage; 290, GA-GND-001000 rev K, GA-GND-001001 rev J, technical specification for cycle shelter prepared by cycle hoop, technical specification for Sheffield stand prepared by cycle hoop and technical specification for toast rack prepared by cycle hoop received on 14/12/2017, and letter from rhp dated 20th December 2017 received on 05/01/2018 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(14) and maintained in accordance with the approved details at all times thereafter.
The approved details shown on approved plans 290, GA-GND-001000 rev K and GA-GND-001001 rev J which lie within the phase 1 development area, as shown on approved plan 'FOUNTAINS CLOSE - PHASING DIAGRAM S73 application', shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development, and thereafter retained and maintained as such at all times thereafter.
All cycle storage shown on approved plans 290, GA-GND-001000 rev K and GA-GND-001001 rev J shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of phase 2 of the development and thereafter retained and maintained as such.

Condition : 14 - The arrangements for storing waste and recycled materials shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details (Plans DWG no 001000-001001, DWG no 005100, DWG no 006100, DWG no 008100, DWG no 010100 received on 11/08/2016 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(3,6,15)).
The approved details shown on approved plans DWG no 001000-001001, DWG no 005100, DWG no 006100, DWG no 008100, DWG no 010100 which lie within the phase 1 development area, as shown on approved plan 'FOUNTAINS CLOSE - PHASING DIAGRAM S73 application', shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development, and thereafter retained and maintained as such at all times thereafter.
All waste and recycling storage shown on approved plans DWG no 001000-001001, DWG no 005100, DWG no 006100, DWG no 008100, DWG no 010100 shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of phase 2 of the development and thereafter retained and maintained as such.
Condition : 15 - Wheelchair accessible units shall be provided in accordance with the approved plans.

Condition : 16 - In this condition "retained tree" means an existing tree which is to be retained in accordance with the approved plans and particulars (including those approved under reference 00461/A/P1(4,10,17,18); and paragraphs (a) and (b) below shall have effect until the expiration of 5 years from the date of the occupation of any part of the development.
(a)	No retained tree shall be cut down, uprooted or destroyed, nor shall any retained tree be topped or lopped other than in accordance with the approved plans and particulars (including those approved under reference 00461/A/P1(4,10,17,18), without the written approval of the local planning authority.  Any topping or lopping approved shall be carried out in accordance with British Standard 3998 (Tree Work) or any other BS replacing this.
(b)	If any retained tree is removed, uprooted or destroyed or dies, another tree shall be planted at the same place and that tree shall be of such size and species, and shall be planted at such time, as may be specified in writing by the local planning authority.
(c)	The erection of fencing for the protection of any retained tree shall be undertaken in accordance with the approved plans and particulars ((including those approved under reference 00461/A/P1(4,10,17,18)) before any equipment, machinery or materials are brought on to the site for the purposes of the development, and shall be maintained until all equipment, machinery and surplus materials have been removed from the site.  Nothing shall be stored or placed in any area fenced in accordance with this condition and the ground levels within those areas shall not be altered, nor shall any excavation be made, without the written consent of the local planning authority.

Condition : 17 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved boundary treatment; DET-GND-001300 rev A received on 25/08/2016, GA-GND-001000 rev E and GA-GND-001001 rev E received on 21/12/2016 approved under reference 00461/A/P1(4,10,17,18) and maintained in accordance with the approved details at all times thereafter.
The approved details shown on approved plans DET-GND-001300 rev A, GA-GND-001000 rev E and GA-GND-001001 rev E which lie within the phase 1 development area, as shown on approved plan 'FOUNTAINS CLOSE - PHASING DIAGRAM S73 application', shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development, and thereafter retained and maintained as such at all times thereafter.
All boundary treatment shown on approved plans DET-GND-001300 rev A, GA-GND-001000 rev E and GA-GND-001001 rev E shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of phase 2 of the development and thereafter retained and maintained as such.

Condition : 18 - The parking spaces numbered in red and shown on submitted plan titled BOUYGUES UK Construction Issue shall be made available for the occupiers of Block C prior to the occupation of any part of the development and shall be so maintained until the completion of phase 2 of the development.
Prior to the occupation of any part of phase 2 of the development a plan illustrating the allocation of all parking spaces within the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details and so maintained at all times thereafter.

Condition : 19 - The development shall be built in two phases in line with submitted plan 'FOUNTAINS CLOSE - PHASING DIAGRAM S73 application'. Phase 1 shall comprise demolition and the erection of Blocks A, B, C, E and F, one pair of semi-detached houses, one terrace of three houses and one terrace of seven houses with associated access, car parking, landscaping, open space and other infrastructure works, whilst Phase 2 will comprise demolition and the erection of Block D and one terrace of eight houses with associated access, car parking, landscaping, open space and other infrastructure works.
